title: Baby, it's cold outside
content: Time to bring in the brass monkeys and all their [lost mitts and hats](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730162944/http:/lasquetipress.blogspot.com/)....
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content:
It's pretty cold in New Yawk, too.

Nice pics of your project -- thanks for sharing! And good luck with everything!
We've got an ambient temp of -33C with a -49C windchill as I type -- it ain't that cold there!

Nope, it ain't! We certainly don't have the kind of weather that forces car owners to bring their car batteries indoors for the night! I'd heard stories about that before... Now I have a first-hand tale.
